long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- easily navigate between failures on Github Actions logs (default search query + keyboard shortcuts)
- have your failed Github Actions displayed at the top - never scroll down again to find them!
- have currently reviewed file highlighted in the file tree
- have tooltips on truncated directory/file names in the tree to always see full path

Feel free to ask for more features using a link in the plugin options.
